solution_line_template: If Loui is currently {loui_current_age} years old, twice her age, which is the same as twice Ramon's age in twenty years, is {loui_current_age}*{multiplier_twice}=<<{loui_current_age}*{multiplier_twice}={ramon_age_in_twenty_years}>>{ramon_age_in_twenty_years}

If in twenty years Ramon will be {ramon_age_in_twenty_years}, currently he is {ramon_age_in_twenty_years}-{years_in_future}= <<{ramon_age_in_twenty_years}-{years_in_future}={ramon_current_age}>>{ramon_current_age} years old.
